ISSUE.TITLE: Dev Branch did not install
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 after correction that the dev branch did not compiled, i loadded the corrected one. But now the compiled coode did not installs an a IIS (not azur). The SQL Table was created, i see it in management studio, but then comes up that error. In App_Data datasettings.json is created, but with no data. { "DataProvider": "", "DataConnectionString": null, "RawDataSettings": {} } Any idea? Installation failes: An error occurred during the activation of a particular registration. See the inner exception for details. Registration: Activator = CodeFirstInstallationService (ReflectionActivator), Services = [Nop.Services.Installation.IInstallationService], Lifetime = Autofac.Core.Lifetime.CurrentScopeLifetime, Sharing = Shared, Ownership = OwnedByLifetimeScope ---> An error occurred during the activation of a particular registration. See the inner exception for details. Registration: Activator = UrlRecordService (ReflectionActivator), Services = [Nop.Services.Seo.IUrlRecordService], Lifetime = Autofac.Core.Lifetime.CurrentScopeLifetime, Sharing = Shared, Ownership = OwnedByLifetimeScope ---> An error occurred during the activation of a particular registration. See the inner exception for details. Registration: Activator = LanguageService (ReflectionActivator), Services = [Nop.Services.Localization.ILanguageService], Lifetime = Autofac.Core.Lifetime.CurrentScopeLifetime, Sharing = Shared, Ownership = OwnedByLifetimeScope ---> An error occurred during the activation of a particular registration. See the inner exception for details. Registration: Activator = StoreMappingService (ReflectionActivator), Services = [Nop.Services.Stores.IStoreMappingService], Lifetime = Autofac.Core.Lifetime.CurrentScopeLifetime, Sharing = Shared, Ownership = OwnedByLifetimeScope ---> An error occurred during the activation of a particular registration. See the inner exception for details. Registration: Activator = CatalogSettings (DelegateActivator), Services = [Nop.Core.Domain.Catalog.CatalogSettings], Lifetime = Autofac.Core.Lifetime.CurrentScopeLifetime, Sharing = Shared, Ownership = OwnedByLifetimeScope ---> No store could be loaded (See inner exception for details.) (See inner exception for details.) (See inner exception for details.) (See inner exception for details.) (See inner exception for details.)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3104 Fixed installation. And made performance optimization of it at the same time (much less database calls during installation)
